Name: [Affinity] Apex Predator
Desc: Nekomata has evoked the Mindscape: <color=#FFAF2C>[Bird Hunter]</color>. After launching a Dash Attack or Dodge Counter, your character can <color=#2BAD00>immediately follow up with</color> certain attacks near the end of the Basic Attack combo.
Desc2: Nekomata is coiled and ready to pounce, just like an apex predator ready to leap out and disappear at any second.
